body_html:
Configure using:

export TF_NEED_GCP=0
export TF_NEED_HDFS=0
export TF_NEED_CUDA=0
export TF_NEED_MKL=0
export TF_NEED_OPENCL=0
export TF_NEED_VERBS=0
export TF_NEED_S3=0
yes "" | ./configure

Build
bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

==> Build successful.

Run bazel test command.

bazel --host_jvm_args="-Xms512m" --host_jvm_args="-Xmx1024m" test \
    --test_tag_filters=-gpu,-benchmark-test -k \
    --test_timeout 300,450,1200,3600 --build_tests_only \
    --test_output=errors -- \
    //tensorflow/... -//tensorflow/compiler/...

==> Facing an issue related to boringssl : #error "Unknown target CPU"

body:
Configure using: 
```
export TF_NEED_GCP=0
export TF_NEED_HDFS=0
export TF_NEED_CUDA=0
export TF_NEED_MKL=0
export TF_NEED_OPENCL=0
export TF_NEED_VERBS=0
export TF_NEED_S3=0
yes "" | ./configure
```


Build
`bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package`

==> Build successful.
  
Run bazel test command. 

```
bazel --host_jvm_args="-Xms512m" --host_jvm_args="-Xmx1024m" test \
    --test_tag_filters=-gpu,-benchmark-test -k \
    --test_timeout 300,450,1200,3600 --build_tests_only \
    --test_output=errors -- \
    //tensorflow/... -//tensorflow/compiler/...
```

==> Facing an issue related to boringssl : #error "Unknown target CPU"
